title: 18 - Is the Bible Anti-Woman? - Guest Bonnie Lewis
description:
In this episode we reveal what we've come to understand about the opinion that the Bible is anti-woman.  Starting with women in church leadership.  Bonnie Lewis spends some time with us again and shares her journey as a female leader in ministry and Mike "Man-splains" how he has come to change his mind about the view of women in leadership over the past 10 years.  As always, please leave your thoughts and questions in the comments below!
